_sText:
Christmas release! :D

This is a space facility located inside a spaceship, it has a generator inside and I was looking at the ambience of the old, rusty looking Vogon Contructor Fleet, so the reason for all the rusty and blocky textures and architecture.
This is a small map intended for fast gameplay and the usual Gun Game action and knifing ;)
3 Ships on the 3d skybox add to the whole space voyage look.

This is a revamp of my first version, changed a lot of things like light, textures, added a generator to the middle as well as added some more detail to it.

Credits go to:
Chizbone for his custom nav_file (you are teh God of Nav's mate :D )
Shini for his space skybox (Great work there Shini, one of the few space syboxes around)
GHS BoonDock for his Pelican ship prefab (Its amazing all I can say)
Cncr04s for his custom textures available on another website. (Err... dont see you anywhere)


Big thanks also go to the guys at GGN for helping out with ideas and comments, and for going beyond the necessary in trying to help out. 

Thanks guys ;)
